Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Leman Russ Tank
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description:
The Lemann Russ Heavy Battle Tank stands as a formidable symbol of the Imperium's might in the war-torn realm. With a rugged design and battle-scarred plating adorned with Imperial iconography, this heavy tank embodies the utilitarian aesthetic of the 41st millennium.

Mounted on its robust chassis is the formidable Main Battle Cannon, a weapon of raw and devastating power, serving as a primary anti-armor and anti-infantry armament. Each shot fired echoes the Imperium's determination to repel the encroaching darkness.

Rolling across the battlefield, the Lemann Russ symbolizes the relentless might of the Imperium, acting as both a harbinger of destruction and a stalwart defender of the Emperor's domain against the myriad threats in GrimWorld 40,000. 

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x2
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel type:</color> Chemfuel
